Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in London (South Bank), Plaza on the River is minutes from Tate Britain and Lambeth Bridge. This 5-star hotel is close to Big Ben and London Eye.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 65 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Your bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and plasma televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features wedding services, a fireplace in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. This hotel has 21 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features wedding services, a fireplace in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 65 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Your bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and plasma televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Located in London (South Bank), Plaza on the River is minutes from Tate Britain and Lambeth Bridge. This 5-star hotel is close to Big Ben and London Eye.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tate Britain - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Lambeth Bridge - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Lambeth Palace - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Vauxhall Bridge - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Victoria Tower - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
St. Thomas' Hospital - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Kennington Oval - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Houses of Parliament - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Florence Nightingale Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Westminster Abbey - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Westminster Bridge - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Queen Elizabeth II Conference Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Parliament Square - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Big Ben - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Imperial War Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.8 km / 14.2 mi

The preferred airport for Plaza on the River is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Plaza on the River are:
London (LCY-London City) - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 37.6 km / 23.4 mi

The preferred airport for Plaza on the River is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.
